{{Description|This domain was occupied by [[The Eremites|desert bandits]] from who-knows-where. Perhaps they must have some unknown treasure on hand.}}
'''The Dark Valley''' is a domain entrance located in [[Ardravi Valley]], [[Sumeru]]. It contains the [[One-Time Domain]] '''The Spirit Tree's Hall'''.

==Leyline Disorder==
After characters deal DMG to opponents with a [[Dendro Core]] (including Burgeon and Hyperbloom), their [[Critical Damage|Crit DMG]] will be increased by 30% for 8s. This effect can stack up to 4 times, and can be triggered once every 0.1s.

==Walkthrough==
# Use [[Clusterleaf of Cultivation]] to access combat area
# Defeat 20 opponents in 30 second(s)
#* Additional time will be gained after each kill
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Eremite Linebreaker*2;Eremite Ravenbeak Halberdier*2;Eremite Sword-Dancer}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Eremite Crossbow*3;Eremite Desert Clearwater}}
#* Wave 3: {{Enemy List|Eremite Linebreaker;Eremite Sword-Dancer*2;Eremite Sunfrost}}
#* Wave 4: {{Enemy List|Eremite Crossbow*2;Eremite Ravenbeak Halberdier;Eremite Daythunder}}
#* Wave 5: {{Enemy List|Eremite Desert Clearwater;Eremite Daythunder;Eremite Sunfrost}}
